title: Advertising
questions: - What effects do advertising have on children?
- Which method of advertising do you think is most popular?
- How do advertisements capture people's attention?
- What do you think of advertisements in your country?
- How has the rise of digital platforms and social media transformed advertising strategies?

title: Animals
questions: - What roles do animals typically play in your country?
- How do human activities impact the lives of wild animals?
- Is it common to own pets in your country?
- What are some pros and cons associated with having a pet?
- Should animals be kept in zoos?

title: Art
questions: - Why do people find enjoyment in art?
- What are some traditional forms of art in your country?
- How important is art as a subject in children's education?
- How frequently do you visit art galleries?
- Why do certain works of art sell for high amounts, whereas others do not?
